about_the_game:
The Tower of the Spells is an RPG inspired by the world of the novel The Order of Dragon Slayers 1, The Muteki Temple by Raúl Pozo. Accompany Samuel Critchlow during his student years at the magic academy The Tower of Spells.

Explore the kingdoms of the Margrast continent and discover their secrets.

Learn new skills and improve your attributes by designing your own combat style.

Collect resources to improve your equipment.

In the final game you will have:
8 chapters.
15 enemies.
8 complete kingdoms.
100 spells.
100 weapons.
40 armors.
150 recipes.
7 professions.

short_description: The Tower of the Spells is a medieval fantasy RPG with pixelated graphics. Accompany Samuel Critchlow during his student years at the magic academy The Tower of the Spells located on the continent of Margrast, a land with many secrets for him to discover.
